title.narrative: Este proyecto establecerá acciones que promuevan la utilización de electrodomésticos que hagan un uso eficiente de la energía.

description.narrative: Este proyecto establecerá acciones que promuevan la utilización de electrodomésticos que hagan un uso eficiente de la energía.
Enhanced capacities of key public and private agencies to design implement and enforce a mandatory SL programme
E Status of programs in key public agencies to implement effective mandatory SL

comment.narrative: E Insufficient implementation of SL program which is in guidelines only
E New policy provisions and compliance checking enforcement and outreach programs adopted that reflect international best practices

The Directive Committee of the project has held meetings in which it has received substantial information provided by the different consultancies studies undertaken during the project implementation This learning process has enabled their capabilities for designing implementing and enforcing a mandatory SL program The committee is formed by key entities in the matter such as the Ministry of Environment Ministry of Energy and Mines Ministry of Production Ministry of Economy and Finance Ministry of External Commerce and Tourism INDECOPI National Institute for the defense of the competence and protection of intellectual property SUNAT National Superintendence of Customs and Tax Administration
E New policy provisions and compliance checking enforcement and outreach programs adopted that reflect international best practices

The Directive Committee of the project has held meetings in which it has received substantial information provided by the different consultancies studies undertaken during the project implementation This learning process has enabled their capabilities for designing implementing and enforcing a mandatory SL program The committee is formed by key entities in the matter such as the Ministry of Environment Ministry of Energy and Mines Ministry of Production Ministry of Economy and Finance Ministry of External Commerce and Tourism INDECOPI National Institute for the defense of the competence and protection of intellectual property SUNAT National Superintendence of Customs and Tax Administration

description.narrative: Heightened consumer awareness and acceptance of SL programme
I Priority of different criteria used by customers in their purchasing decision and of private sector in marketing their products

comment.narrative: I No emphasis among the consumers and sales personnel on energy efficiency aspects and life cycle costs when purchasing and marketing new appliances
I Beside the initial purchasing price energy efficiency and lifecycle costs have become a key criteria for purchasing decisions guided by the energy label

A communication strategy has been designed and a bidding process for its implementation has been launched The strategy is targeted at consumers to increase their awareness and acceptance to the SL program
I Beside the initial purchasing price energy efficiency and lifecycle costs have become a key criteria for purchasing decisions guided by the energy label

A communication strategy has been designed and a bidding process for its implementation has been launched The strategy is targeted at consumers to increase their awareness and acceptance to the SL program

description.narrative: Information and knowledge on SL programme generated and shared
J The level of information available for monitoring and evaluation and adaptive management

comment.narrative: J NA
J Adequate information available for adaptive management and measuring the impact

A financial audit was carried out for the period 20122014 The auditor recommended keeping the control and follow up as part of the project management
The quarterly reports of the physical progress of the project were handed over timely

description.narrative: Market transformation strategy implemented with public and private sector involvement based on consolidated information on the market structure
F Level of info available to define energy consumption in label categories and for measuring project impact

comment.narrative: F Data available in MINEMs database but needs to be updated and expanded
F Regularly updated data on annual sale and energy consumption and technology characteristics of different appliances per energy classes available

A study was concluded in December 2014 with the following topics a structure evolution and projection of the market related to energy equipment refrigerator washing machine dryer conditioner air machine water heater electric motors and boiler b data base of energy consumption and end use of technologies and c measurement of environmental energy and economic impacts for efficiency energy labeling
F Regularly updated data on annual sale and energy consumption and technology characteristics of different appliances per energy classes available

A study was concluded in December 2014 with the following topics a structure evolution and projection of the market related to energy equipment refrigerator washing machine dryer conditioner air machine water heater electric motors and boiler b data base of energy consumption and end use of technologies and c measurement of environmental energy and economic impacts for efficiency energy labeling

description.narrative: G Status of recommendations contributing to institutional sustainability transformation strategy

comment.narrative: G Data available in MINEMs database but needs to be updated and expanded

G Regularly updated data on annual sale and energy consumption and technology characteristics of different appliances per energy classes available for public use with finalized market monitoring methodology

The elaboration of the strategy depends on others processes some of them are concluded and others are in process therefore the strategy has not been designed yet and is scheduled for next year The status of such processes is
A study related to market aspects and energy consumption which was detailed in a point before was concluded in December 2014
Two international bids have been launched 1 Diagnosis and Evaluation of Laboratories for Labeling and 2 Development of a System of Conformity Assessment for the Certification of Energy Efficiency Labeling Currently the proposals are under evaluation
A study on the management treatment and disposal of solid waste and emissions from energy equipment the study has been launched as part of a bidding process

G Regularly updated data on annual sale and energy consumption and technology characteristics of different appliances per energy classes available for public use with finalized market monitoring methodology

A study related to market aspects and energy consumption which was detailed in a point before was concluded in December 2014
Two international bids have been launched 1 Diagnosis and Evaluation of Laboratories for Labeling and 2 Development of a System of Conformity Assessment for the Certification of Energy Efficiency Labeling Currently the proposals are under evaluation
A study on the management treatment and disposal of solid waste and emissions from energy equipment the study has been launched as part of a bidding process

description.narrative: Strengthened legal framework for mandatory SL and endorsed final Technical Regulations
H Status of decisionmaking regarding introduction of mandatory EE SL

comment.narrative: H Mandatory MEPS exist for CFLs voluntary labels and MEPS for ballasts cloth washers fluorescent lamps refrigerators and freezers air conditioners and electric water heaters
H Decrees signed by the Council of Ministers on Technical regulations making labels andor MEPs mandatory in the refrigerators freezers water heaters washing machines and electric motors

9 projects of technical regulations related to energy efficiency were concluded at the end of December 2014 The projects were related to the following equipment fluorescent lamps ballasts for fluorescent lamps used in lighting for domestic purpose refrigerators washing machines dryers conditioner air machines water heaters electric motors and boilers The regulation projects were published to allow the public participation during their approval process Up to date more than 600 public opinions have been received and evaluated In this context meetings with the technical body and the decision makers to reach a consensus for the approval of such regulations are ongoing
H Decrees signed by the Council of Ministers on Technical regulations making labels andor MEPs mandatory in the refrigerators freezers water heaters washing machines and electric motors

9 projects of technical regulations related to energy efficiency were concluded at the end of December 2014 The projects were related to the following equipment fluorescent lamps ballasts for fluorescent lamps used in lighting for domestic purpose refrigerators washing machines dryers conditioner air machines water heaters electric motors and boilers The regulation projects were published to allow the public participation during their approval process Up to date more than 600 public opinions have been received and evaluated In this context meetings with the technical body and the decision makers to reach a consensus for the approval of such regulations are ongoing

description.narrative: To reduce CO2 emissions through the implementation of a mandatory energy efficiency standards and labels program
D Amount of CO2 emissions avoided directly and indirectly

comment.narrative:
Causality factor in the emission reduction scenario is assumed to be 60 this means that of the emission reduction 20112015 of 416 MTCO2 249 MTCO2 can be attributed to the project s intervention of which
Direct emission reduction due to project s intervention 20112015 301 ktCO2
Indirect emission reduction postproject impact 20162025 2192 ktCO2
The indicator cannot be measured yet at this point of the project implementation

description.narrative: A Change in annual sales towards average higher efficiency appliances lower unit energy consumption UEC

comment.narrative: A See UEC table in footnote below

B NA there is no mandatory SL

B Based on the surveys of output 21 the role of informal trade will be quantified Based on this a noncompliant product will be defined A preliminary aim is at least 50 should be compliant by the end of the project
The indicator cannot be measured yet at this point of the project implementation

B Based on the surveys of output 21 the role of informal trade will be quantified Based on this a noncompliant product will be defined A preliminary aim is at least 50 should be compliant by the end of the project
The indicator cannot be measured yet at this point of the project implementation
C Annual electricity demand will grow to 1000 TJ by 2018 and corresponding GHG emissions see Figure 1 in UNDP Prodoc

C The Referential Plan mentions a savings potential of 54 TJ annually by the year 2018 with corresponding cumulative GHG reduction of 356 million tCO2 over the period 20092018 of which around 5 1780 ktCO2 due to electricity savings by consumers excluding lighting motors and efficient water heaters The estimate of direct and indirect emissions 1217 ktCO2 over the period 20112018 fits within the Referential Plan s projections See also Section 1 in the UNDP ProDoc for more details
The indicator cannot be measured yet at this point of the project implementation
